raw_body: DIAS – SRINATH PRIANTHA passed away peacefully on 01.04.2024. Dearly beloved husband of Sarah,​ cherished father of Snehath and Shenath,​ loving father-in-law of Anushi and Sonali,​ doting grandad of Jaden,​ Javon Caleb and Ruth,​ loving brother of late Priyalal and of Devika. Remains lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour,​ Mt. Lavinia for viewing on Thursday from 9.00 a.m. – 3.00 p.m. Funeral Service at 4 p.m. at the Moratumulla Methodist Church followed by burial at the Church Cemetery.         023353
